results.title: Report a missed bin collection - Maidstone Borough Council
results.snippet: You can tell us if we missed your recycling, general waste, garden waste or food bin. Missed bins must be reported within 48 hours of your collection day.

selected_links.title: Report a missed bin collection - Maidstone Borough Council
strengths: Dedicated page for reporting missed bin collections
Clear instruction on how to report within 48 hours of collection day
selected_links.reasoning: This link directly leads to a page specifically designed for residents to report missed bin collections, providing a prompt and efficient avenue for the council customer information requirements.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially addresses this need
Reason.reasoning: The content provides instructions on how to report a missed bin collection, but it does not explicitly mention what to do if you forgot to put your bin out. However, the general process of reporting a missed collection can still help in this scenario.
Reason.next_actions: Report the missed bin collection and hope that the council will consider your late placement due to forgetfulness.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides clear and concise information on how to report a missed bin collection, but it could improve by explicitly stating the process for forgotten collections. The overall satisfaction level is high as it effectively addresses the concerns of a council resident needing to report a missed bin collection.
